document.full_text: by the summer of 2008, then illinois governor rod blagojevich realized he might have the power to appoint a senator to represent illinois, blagojevich testified on tuesday at his federal corruption trial.
document.title: blagojevich outlines senator considerations
lines_and_colors: by the summer of 2008, then illinois governor rod blagojevich realized he might have the power to appoint a senator to represent illinois, blagojevich testified on tuesday at his federal corruption trial.
